pages.text: With the "$(t:The potential power, mind you)power$()"of $(t:Invoked with a Heart of Stone)potential$(), bodies can be bound to each other.$(br)In order to do so, the Rite of Binding must be cast. $(br)For the rite to have an effect, some criteria must be met:

$(li)One entity nearby has $(marked)potential$(), which can be applied by hitting it with a $(l:vitalis/entry_heart_stone)Heart of Stone$()$(li)One $(t:Yourself, at best)player$() must be pretty close to the Nexus$(li)A Heart of Stone must be tossed near the altar.$(br)The closest player to the altar will then bind their body to the living entity with potential.$(br)This will have effects $(t:i.e. being under the Health Sharing effect)under certain conditions$().

Usually, the player can only bind to one entity.$(br)If the player wants to remove all of their bound entities, they can simply perform the $(marked)Unbinding Rite$(), which will unbind all entities for the closest player$().$(br)When using a $(item)Heart of Stone$(), particles will appear around all entities the user is bound to.
